tasks.label: server: node test (verbose)
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test --test-reporter spec dist/__tests__/app.test.js; Pop-Location

tasks.label: server: test single (illustrate https)
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test dist/__tests__/app.test.js --test-name-pattern "illustrate returns https url"; Pop-Location

tasks.label: server: test single (illustrate https) rerun
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test dist/__tests__/app.test.js --test-name-pattern "illustrate returns https url"; Pop-Location

tasks.label: server: test single (illustrate https) debug
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test dist/__tests__/app.test.js --test-name-pattern "illustrate returns https url"; Pop-Location

tasks.label: server: test filter (proper order)
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test --test-name-pattern "illustrate returns https url" dist/__tests__/app.test.js; Pop-Location

tasks.label: server: npm test (tap tail)
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test --test-reporter tap dist/__tests__/app.test.js | Select-Object -Last 120; Pop-Location

tasks.label: server: npm test (tap tail 400)
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test --test-reporter tap dist/__tests__/app.test.js | Select-Object -Last 400; Pop-Location

tasks.label: server: npm test (show failing test)
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test --test-reporter tap dist/__tests__/app.test.js | Select-String -Pattern '^not ok' -Context 0,8; Pop-Location

tasks.label: server: npm test (show failing test v2)
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test --test-reporter tap dist/__tests__/app.test.js | Select-String -Pattern '^not ok' -Context 0,8; Pop-Location

tasks.label: server: test filter (illustrate moderation)
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test --test-name-pattern "illustrate moderation" dist/__tests__/app.test.js; Pop-Location

tasks.label: server: write tap results file
args: Push-Location "c:\src\kidsdom\server"; npm run build; node --test --test-reporter tap dist/__tests__/app.test.js *> test-results.tap.txt; Pop-Location
